snippet.title: Offworld Trading Company - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
10% off when you buy direct from Stardock: http://www.offworldgame.com/store

Also available on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/271240

Become an entrepreneur trying to take control of the Martian market in this economic strategy game by Civilization IV lead designer, Soren Johnson.

Developed by Mohawk Games (http://www.mohawkgames.com) and published by Stardock: (http://www.stardock.com) 

***
Find us on http://Twitch.tv/stardock
Streaming live all your favorite games and more!

Like us on Facebook: http://bit.ly/Stardock_on_Facebook
Follow us on Twitter: http://bit.ly/Stardock_on_Twitter


Copyright © 2016 Stardock Entertainment and Mohawk Games. Offworld Trading Company is a trademark of Mohawk Games.
